title: Fraction and Decimal Connection Quiz
description: Test your understanding of fractions and decimals

questions.question: What decimal equals 7/10?
questions.explanation: 7/10 means 7 tenths, which is written as 0.7. The 7 is in the tenths place.

questions.question: What fraction equals 0.45?
questions.explanation: 0.45 has two decimal places, so it's hundredths. That means 45/100. This can simplify to 9/20.

questions.question: Which decimal is the largest?
questions.explanation: 0.32 is larger than 0.23 because 32 hundredths > 23 hundredths. Line up the decimal points to compare!

questions.question: 0.5 and 5/10 are the same value.
questions.explanation: Yes! 0.5 = 5/10. Both equal five tenths or one half.

questions.question: What does 0.09 represent?
questions.explanation: 0.09 has a 0 in the tenths place and 9 in the hundredths place, so it's 9 hundredths or 9/100.
